chunk: Ingredients: AQUA/WATER, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, GLYCERIN, DECYL COCOATE, TRIPELARGONIN, ARACHIDYL ALCOHOL, BEHENYL ALCOHOL, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, ECTOIN, HYDROXYECTOIN, CENTELLA ASIATICA EXTRACT, ARACHIDYL GLUCOSIDE, SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER, ISOHEXADECANE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN,

ALCOHOL, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, ECTOIN, HYDROXYECTOIN, CENTELLA ASIATICA EXTRACT, ARACHIDYL GLUCOSIDE, SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER, ISOHEXADECANE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, POLYSORBATE 80, SODIUM BENZOATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, SORBITAN OLEATE

Directions: Usage: For daily use, morning and evening. Gently smooth under eyes small amount of the cream.

Warnings: Do not use in case of hypersensitivity to any of its ingredients. External use only. Avoid contact with mucous membranes. Stop using and contact a doctor if an adverse reaction occurs. Keep out of reach of children.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
